featured.name: DeepSpace Offseason Codebase
featured.description: This is the code behind @frc5024's robot for the 2019 offseason. I have spent a large amount of my free time adding every feature that I wished we had during the season as a way to familiarize myself with the WPIlib Java API.

rows.name: ThriftyField
rows.description: ThriftyField is an open source replacement for the FIRST FMS software. This tool allows mass control over robots, along with real-time scoring and an audience display.

rows.description: DevDNS is a devRant bot for resolving DNS queries send via devRantâ€™s comments system.

rows.name: Dirobium
rows.description: Dirobium is a fantasy CPU emulator that I built to teach myself basic low-level programming

rows.name: devCredits
rows.description: My first community project, a tool help people credit contributors on their devRant community projects
